txt.en: DNT - 'You know of Limael's Vineyard, yes? There is an abundance of beehives near the entrance.'
Set the lantern onto the river
Gairil is working at the Celondim docks to the south.\n\nYou should bring the beeswax to him.
Limael's Vineyard is located to the north-west of Celondim.\n\nYou can find beeswax from the hives near the vineyard's entrance.
DNT - Place the lantern into the river

While creating lanterns for his fellow Elves, Gairil the lantern-maker has run out of candle materials and needs help collecting more.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>

'Many thanks! This will be more than enough for now.\n\n'Take this lantern and send it on its way westward down the river. You've helped my kinsmen pay their respects, and I believe you have earned it.'
Set the lantern onto the river
Gairil has given you one of the lanterns he crafted earlier.\n\nYou should set the lantern down onto the river.
Set the lantern onto the river

'The time has flown by, hasn't it? It seems I became lost in my work. But you have come at a most opportune time.

'Let me explain: I craft lanterns for those who have sailed West, so that their lights may shine in Middle-earth again for just a while. Their loved ones come to send the lanterns downstream. If they cannot journey here, I place the lanterns into the river myself.

'Alas, I am running out of beeswax for my candles. I would gather more from the beehives near the entrance to Limael's Vineyard, but I have many lanterns to create. If you could aid me, I would be most grateful.'

DNT - 'My apologies, the time flew by! But Celairel sent you at a most opportune time.

'Let me explain: I craft lanterns for those who have sailed West, so that their lights may shine in Middle-earth again for just a while. Their loved ones come to send the lanterns downstream. If they cannot journey here, I place the lanterns into the river myself.

'Alas, I am running out of beeswax for my candles. I would gather more from the beehives near the entrance to Limael's Vineyard, but I have many lanterns to create. If you could aid me, I would be most grateful.'
DNT - Gairil can be found near the river at Celondim, to the south of Duillond.\n\nCelairel wants you to check on him.
